meanings.definition: Carved or shaped with a chisel
meanings.sent1: The chiseled statue stood proudly in the park.
meanings.sent2: Her chiseled features made her a perfect model for the artist.
meanings.sent3: The chiseled pumpkin face looked both spooky and impressive.
meanings.sent4: His chiseled physique was a testament to his dedication to fitness.
meanings.sent5: The chiseled mountains loomed majestically in the distance.

meanings.definition: Having a sharply defined facial features
meanings.sent1: The actor's chiseled jawline was his most striking feature.
meanings.sent2: She admired the chiseled profile of the ancient statue.
meanings.sent3: The chiseled face on the rock formation seemed to wink at hikers passing by.
meanings.sent4: Her chiseled cheekbones could cut through glass.
meanings.sent5: The chiseled face in the painting seemed almost lifelike.

meanings.definition: To cut or shape with a chisel
meanings.sent1: He carefully chiseled away at the block of wood to reveal the hidden sculpture.
meanings.sent2: The artist chiseled intricate patterns into the stone.
meanings.sent3: She playfully chiseled her initials into the tree trunk.
meanings.sent4: Time had chiseled away at the ancient ruins, leaving them weathered and worn.
meanings.sent5: The sculptor chiseled a masterpiece out of the marble block.
